successes.title: Dick Figures: The Movie
successes.description:
A Dick Figures movie written and directed by Ed Skudder & Zack Keller.
Join Red & Blue on their biggest adventure yet!

Pledges.description: A DRM-free, HD digital download of Dick Figures: The Movie and access to the exclusive Behind-The-Scenes content and community forum.
Please add $20 to your pledge if you require INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING.
A DRM-free, high-quality version of the movie soundtrack, plus all previous rewards.
An HD digital download of the complete Behind-The-Scenes exclusive content, plus all previous rewards.
HD, DRM-Free download of Seasons 1-4 of "Dick Figures" (40 episodes + extras), plus the Soundtracks for all four seasons (including singles) and all previous rewards.

High-resolution PDF version of the The Art of Dick Figures, a full-color art book chronicling the history and making of Dick Figures (available exclusively on Kickstarter) & a PDF version of the full Dick Figures: The Movie script, plus all previous rewards.
Special Edition DVD copy of Dick Figures: The Movie, exclusive Kickstarter-only Dick Figures movie T-Shirt, and a ringtone collection featuring the show’s characters, plus all previous rewards!

Limited Edition Red Power Hat, signed by Ed & Zack and the entire cast and crew of Dick Figures, plus all previous rewards. Only available to those who select this tier specifically. The hat is that powerful.

Limited Edition Blue "Dungeon Master" Hat, signed by Ed & Zack and the entire cast and crew of Dick Figures, plus all previous rewards. Only available to those who select this tier specifically. The hat is that nerdy.

Limited Edition LORD TOURETTES HAT, signed by Ed & Zack and the entire cast and crew of Dick Figures, plus all previous rewards (except Red's Power Hat). Only available to those who specifically select this tier.
A full-sized Special Edition movie poster autographed by Ed Skudder & Zack Keller and a “Thank You” in the movie’s credits, plus all previous rewards

WANT A POSTER & A HAT? 
Choose this level and add either a LORD TOURETTES HAT or the RED POWER HAT to the $250 Movie Poster tier. Both hats are autographed too. You get to choose which hat you’d like to receive and you’ll get everything in the $250 Movie Poster tier.

WANT ALL THREE HATS? Choose this level  and you get the LORD TOURETTES HAT & RED'S POWER HAT & BLUE'S "Dungeon Master" HAT. All the hats are autographed too. You’ll get everything in the $100 PLUS we'll give you the Movie Poster as well. WOW!!!!
A signed, original piece of artwork created by Ed Skudder. You will be able to send in your picture request (within reason) and Ed will draw it for you. Plus all previous reward tiers.

A paperback version of The Art of Dick Figures, a full-color art book chronicling the history and making of Dick Figures (available exclusively on Kickstarter) autographed by Ed Skudder & Zack Keller, plus all previous rewards.
A hand-drawn portrait with you, in your favorite color, with Red and Blue (send us a photo!), plus all previous rewards.
A spoken line and animated appearance (send us a photo) in the movie with your name in the official cast credits, plus all previous rewards.
Official “Executive Producer” credit on the movie, plus all previous rewards.
